/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, there are trees and buildings, their details softened by the distance. The road itself is divided by a median, and a sidewalk runs parallel to it on the right side. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and brown, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
